item.copper_gear_set.sword.tooltip: Durable copper blade, outlasts iron weapons
item.copper_gear_set.sword.tooltip.detai: Lower damage than iron but 60% more durability. Perfect for extended combat.
item.copper_gear_set.pickaxe.tooltip: Reliable mining tool with extended lifespan
item.copper_gear_set.pickaxe.tooltip.det: Mines at iron level but lasts much longer. Ideal for extensive mining expeditions.
item.copper_gear_set.axe.tooltip: Sturdy woodcutting tool built to last
item.copper_gear_set.axe.tooltip.detail: Chops wood effectively with superior durability compared to iron axes.
item.copper_gear_set.shovel.tooltip.deta: Perfect for earthwork projects requiring long-lasting tools.
item.copper_gear_set.hoe.tooltip.detail: Tills soil reliably with enhanced durability for large-scale farming.
item.copper_gear_set.helmet.tooltip.deta: Slightly less protection than iron but 33% more durability for extended adventures.
item.copper_gear_set.chestplate.tooltip: Robust chest protection built for endurance
Balanced defense with superior longevity compared to standard iron armor.
item.copper_gear_set.leggings.tooltip: Durable leg armor for extended journeys
item.copper_gear_set.leggings.tooltip.de: Reliable protection that outlasts iron leggings in demanding conditions.
item.copper_gear_set.boots.tooltip.detai: Enhanced durability makes these boots perfect for extensive exploration.
